  Decadel/Hell Drak/Necromancer

          Decadel still had Hell Drak with him, the end of his long body
wrapped around her.  He soon got back to the Predacon base, and he layed
Hell Drak on the ground.  He transformed into robot mode, and picked her up.
He looked her from top to bottom.  Her body was long and slender, and curvy.
She was beautiful.  But she was an enemy!!!!!!!!!  He carried her inside,
and took her into the lab, and sat her down.  He sent a transmission to
Blackarachnia, "Blackarachnia, leader, I have captured a female Maximal, she
is in the lab here.  What shall we do with her??"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Hell Drak felt herself laying down on a hard surface.  She could
hear Decadel talking to Blackarachnia on his com.  She was technically at
the Predacon base, but, in her mind, she had no clue where she was.  Her
optics remained shut, she couldn't open them.  She also felt she was covered
in dirt.  She remembered being with her brother, being let in to the Maximal
base, the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
             Necromancer stopped crying, and got up.

            "Yes, we just have to locate them.  I suspect that evil fiend
took my sister to a Predacon base," He said, calmed down now.
